title: Comparing the efficacy and safety of high-voltage and standard-voltage pulsed radiofrequency for the treatment of postherpetic neuralgia: A pooled analysis from randomized controlled trials
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Shihong Cai, Li Du, Xiaoming Xiang, Chengjiang Liu, Yanfeng Zhang, Zhiyou Peng, Xianhui Kang, Zhiying Feng
